item.title: Is More Always Better? Or Less?
item.description:
While I appreciate a wealth of information, sometimes less is more, especially when dealing with large volumes of data. Too much information can lead to wasted time and frustration. Let’s illustrate this with posting in Dynamics GP. In Posting Setup (Tools»Setup»Posting»Posting), you control posting details with the “Create a Journal Entry Per” setting. Choosing “Transaction” is akin to posting in “detail” mode. Every transaction within the chosen series and origin creates a separate journal entry in the General Ledger...
